title: Carol S. Batey
text:
Carol S. Batey (born September 11, 1955) is an American model, writer and lifestyle coach.
Biography.
Carol Batey was born in <a href="Nashville">Nashville</a>, Tennessee, on September 11, 1955. At the age of 49, she decided to change her life after 21 years of marriage. By the age of 54, she was a professional model contracted to a major modeling agency. Today, she is an author, <a href="lifestyle%20coach">lifestyle coach</a>, owner of Carol's Vibration Cooking and Skin-Care Products. LMT, licensed esthetician, professional model, mother of six, reflexologist, professional speaker and massage therapist.
